headline: SLB Readies Rapid Expansion in Venezuela
summary: SLB logged higher fourth-quarter revenue and said some of the challenges it faced last year are behind it, as it stands to benefit from increasing international activity.

headline: Stock Market Today: Dow Slumps 250 Points, But Nasdaq Shrugs Off Intel Tumble, Turns Higher (Live Coverage)

headline: S&P 500 Oilfield Service Giant SLB Beats Earnings, Raises Dividend With Headwinds 'Behind' It
summary: S&P 500 oilfield service giant SLB reported early Friday better-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings and revenue while also increasing its quarterly dividend and telling investors business headwinds are in the rearview mirror.  For 2026, SLB forecasts capital investment to be approximately $2.5 billion, about even with $2.4 billion in capital expenditures during 2025.  SLB plans to return more than $4 billion to shareholders in 2026 through dividends and share repurchases.

For 2026, SLB forecasts capital investment to be approximately $2.5 billion, about even with $2.4 billion in capital expenditures during 2025.  SLB plans to return more than $4 billion to shareholders in 2026 through dividends and share repurchases.

headline: SLB Stock Rises on Earnings. Struggles in Key Regions ‘Are Behind Us,’ Says CEO.

headline: American oil company CEOs feel increasingly ‘slighted’ by Trump’s focus on Venezuela: ‘That’s bad for U.S. producers’
summary: Trump’s fixation on hiking oil volumes from OPEC and Venezuela to lower prices at the pump is leaving U.S. oil producers annoyed with weak domestic pricing and drilling activity.

raw.headline: American oil company CEOs feel increasingly ‘slighted’ by Trump’s focus on Venezuela: ‘That’s bad for U.S. producers’
raw.summary: Trump’s fixation on hiking oil volumes from OPEC and Venezuela to lower prices at the pump is leaving U.S. oil producers annoyed with weak domestic pricing and drilling activity.
